TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Randy_Allen, title = Randy_Allen, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Randy_Allen} }

S.FORM: Randy Allen mhtuw kawas tay 1965 neng 1 gaci 16 nici ka Florida na Amirika, ga mzuyzi mari te NBA Amirika. kinwagiq nya ga 203cm ru kinwusu nya ga 10kg,pinspyang nya ga maki te glang. kawas tay 1987 neng musa mzyup sa sensyu NBA ga ini agal kya, ru wal ini gluw squ giqas sensyu NBA lalu nya. Raygak ga minmzuyzi mari squ Florida State University. Ryax qnxan niya' Pwazyaw sa giqas na sesyuw squw Kawas te 1987 ga wan ini' agal kya. Kawas te 1990 lga wan pbiru' kayak sa Sacrmento kings, ruw Denver Nuggets ruw Chicago Bulls, ga ini' qbsyaq ga wan nha' n_gyutun malax la. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' Lists of National Basketball Association players

Randy Allen mhtow kawas tay 1965 neng 1 gaci 16 nici ka Florida na Amirika, ga mzoyzi mari te NBA Amirika. kinwagiq nya ga 203cm ro kinwoso nya ga 10kg,pinspyang nya ga maki te glang. kawas tay 1987 neng mosa mzyop sa sensyo NBA ga ini agal kya, ro wal ini glow sqo giqas sensyo NBA lalo nya. Raygak ga minmzoyzi mari sqo Florida State University. Ryax qnxan niya' Pwazyaw sa giqas na sesyow sqow Kawas te 1987 ga wan ini' agal kya. Kawas te 1990 lga wan pbiro' kayak sa Sacrmento kings, row Denver Noggets row Chicago Bolls, ga ini' qbsyaq ga wan nha' n_gyoton malax la. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' Lists of National Basketball Association players
